metadata.titleEn: Global Cryospheric Extent and Phenology Dataset (1979-2016)
metadata.titleCn: 全球冰冻圈范围及物候数据集（1979-2016）
metadata.description: Under the background of global warming, the cryosphere is one of the most sensitive spheres to climate change. The cryosphere is the world's largest reservoir of freshwater resources. The change of the cryosphere has an important impact on the energy exchange, water resources, ecology and disaster process of the earth atmosphere system. Therefore, it is particularly important to explore the response of cryosphere change to climate change. Using satellite remote sensing data, reanalysis data, and observation data, the cryosphere elements were integrated to build a global scale cryosphere range and phenology dataset for 1979-2016. The results can be used to further study the response mechanism of the cryosphere to climate change, as well as to provide basic support for the research of ecosystems, carbon cycle, etc.
metadata.descriptionCn: 在全球气候变暖背景下，冰冻圈是气候变化最敏感圈层之一。冰冻圈是世界上最大的淡水资源库。冰冻圈的变化对于地气系统能量交换、水资源、生态、灾害过程等产生重要影响。所以探究冰冻圈变化对于气候变化响应显得尤为重要。利用卫星遥感资料、再分析数据、观测资料，集合冰冻圈各要素于一体，构建了1979-2016年全球尺度冰冻圈范围及物候数据集。其结果可以用于进一步冰冻圈对气候变化响应机制研究，以及对于生态系统、碳循环等研究提供基础支撑。

background: According to ongoing temperature analyses, the average global temperature on Earth has increased by slightly more than 1°C since 1880. Furthermore, the near-surface atmosphere in high-latitude and high-altitude regions has warmed faster than elsewhere. Observational records of ocean heat content show accelerated warming as well. The global temperature rise has resulted in a worldwide cryospheric reduction as evidenced by, for example, a strong increase in ice loss, pervasive ice sheet mass loss, large decreases in sea ice cover and thickness, and terrestrial snow cover extent decreases. The cryosphere plays a major role in earth's climate system. Most cryospheric assessments focus on one or more of its components and their response to climate change.
research objective: We therefore determine such a holistic estimate and quantify changes to the hemispheric and global cryosphere due to climate change, by synthesizing sea ice, snow cover, and frozen ground extents into one global cryospheric extent data set. Our findings highlight the importance of assessing the cryosphere as a whole, and provide a way to quantitatively estimate its overall changes.
methods: To combine the three major cryospheric components into one global cryospheric extent data set, we grid all products into one uniform 0.25° × 0.25° spatial resolution using nearest neighbor interpolation at the daily time scale. For the ground surface freeze/thaw status, the twice daily (AM and PM) values were averaged into daily resolution, and also interpolated to the 0.25° × 0.25° spatial resolution using nearest neighbor interpolation. For snow cover, ERA-Interim snow depths are used to identify snow cover based on daily snow depths greater than 1 cm. The snow cover extent data set also again includes ice sheets, that is, Greenland and Antarctica. Sea ice extent is available at the daily time scale, except for the time period from November 1, 1978 to August 19, 1987 when data were only available every other day. For this period, we interpolated the sea ice extent into daily resolution. Finally, we combined all three data sets into one, where each grid cell was classified as cryosphere if it contains at least one of the frozen surface types: frozen ground (including ice sheets), snow cover, or sea ice cover. If a grid cell contains one or more cryospheric variables, it is defined as one single cell occupied by cryosphere. Based on this classification, we produced the daily cryospheric extent data set. To assess the long-term spatiotemporal variability of the cryosphere, we calculate both the area extent and the percent cover. For area extent, we calculated the daily areas for the NH, SH, and the whole globe. We also create monthly and annual area extents to quantify changes in cryospheric area extent based on the daily area extent datasets in each year. All area extent calculations are based on equal area projections. The percent cover is calculated as the ratio of days that each grid contains cryospheric cover during the defined time scale, for example, per month, or per year. To characterize the timing and duration of cryospheric cover, we identify the first date (FD), last date (LD), duration (DR), and number of days (ND) of cryospheric cover. We investigate anomalies of monthly and annual variables with respect to the 1981–2000 long-term average. Trends are calculated using linear regression of the anomalies. Statistical significance of trends was established using two-tailed t-tests at the 95% confidence level. Time series are smoothed using wavelet analysis. The uncertainty of the trends is also determined using the 95% confidence level. The daily cryospheric extent is verified using the GSOD product. To verify our reconstructed daily cryosphere extent data set, 14,310 stations were used for validation. The observed daily cryospheric status at each station is determined based on the above method using observed daily minimum air temperature and snow depth. Next, the reconstructed daily cryospheric extent value at each station location is extracted. The observed (GSOD) cryospheric status is then used to verify our reconstructed daily cryospheric extent.
dataset: Data sets used in this study include sea ice, snow cover, and near-surface frozen soils. Area extent of both the Greenland and Antarctic Ice Sheets is included in either snow cover or near-surface frozen soil products. We essentially synthesize three major data products: near-surface frozen soil data, snow cover extent data, and sea ice area extent. To analyze the cryospheric extent's relationship with climate change, air temperature data are used. We also use in-situ station observations to validate our global cryospheric area extent. Sea ice is a major cryospheric component for the Arctic and Antarctic oceans. Here, we use the daily sea ice extent data set for 1978–2016 with 25 × 25 km spatial resolution from the National Snow and Ice Data Center (NSIDC). For global snow cover extent, we use snow depth from the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts interim reanalysis (ERA-Interim) for 1979 to 2016 with a spatial resolution of 0.25° × 0.25°. Daily ground surface freeze/thaw status data span from 1979 to 2016 and are available at 25 × 25 km resolution from NSIDC. Global monthly average air temperature data were obtained beginning in 1979 from the University of East Anglia's Climatic Research Unit time series version 4.04. Station data are used in this study to verify our daily cryospheric extent data set. The global summary of the day (GSOD) product is produced by the National Centers for Environmental Information with inputs from integrated surface data. The GSOD data set is made up of more than 28,000 stations from 1929 to the present, and includes minimum, maximum, and mean air temperature, snow depth, air pressure, dewpoint temperature, wind speed, and precipitation variables.
findings: During 1979–2016, global cryospheric area extent lost approximately 87 ± 11 × 10^3 km2/yr, with a decrease of 102 ± 9.7 × 10^3 km2/yr in the NH that was partly offset by an increase of 14.6 ± 4.4 × 10^3 km2/yr in the SH. The first day of cryospheric cover was delayed by 3.6 days at a rate of 0.95 days/decade, and the last day advanced by 5.7 days, at a rate of 1.5 days/decade. The duration and number of cryospheric cover days decreased by 8.7 days and 7.6 days over the study period, respectively. These variations of global cryospheric extent are correlated with rising air temperatures.
backgroundCn: 根据持续的温度分析，自1880年以来，地球的平均全球温度已上升超过1°C。此外，高纬度和高海拔地区的近地面大气温度升高的速度快于其他地区。海洋热含量的观测记录显示出加速变暖的趋势。全球温度的上升导致了全球范围内的冰冻圈减少，具体表现为冰损失显著增加、冰盖质量普遍下降、海冰覆盖和厚度大幅减少，以及陆地雪盖范围的减少。冰冻圈在地球气候系统中发挥着重要作用。大多数冰冻圈评估集中于其一个或多个组成部分及其对气候变化的响应。
research objectiveCn: 因此，我们通过将海冰、雪盖和冻土的范围综合成一个全球冰冻圈范围数据集，来确定这种整体估计并量化气候变化对半球和全球冰冻圈的影响。我们的研究结果强调了整体评估冰冻圈的重要性，并提供了一种定量估计其整体变化的方法。
methodsCn: 为了将三个主要的冰冻圈组成部分合并为一个全球冰冻圈范围数据集，我们将所有产品以0.25° × 0.25°的统一空间分辨率进行网格化，采用最近邻插值法，时间尺度为每日。对于地面冻结/解冻状态，采用每日两次（上午和下午）的值进行平均，随后也使用最近邻插值法转换为0.25° × 0.25°的空间分辨率。对于雪盖，使用ERA-Interim的雪深数据来识别雪盖，基于每日雪深大于1厘米的标准。雪盖范围数据集还包括冰盖，即格林兰和南极洲。海冰范围的数据以每日时间尺度提供，除了1978年11月1日至1987年8月19日这段时间，数据仅每隔一天提供一次。对于这一时期，我们将海冰范围插值为每日分辨率。最后，我们将所有三个数据集合并为一个，其中每个网格单元被分类为冰冻圈，如果它包含至少一种冰冻表面类型：冻结土壤（包括冰盖）、雪盖或海冰覆盖。如果一个网格单元包含一个或多个冰冻圈变量，则定义为一个被冰冻圈占据的单一网格单元。基于这一分类，我们生成了每日冰冻圈范围数据集。为了评估冰冻圈的长期时空变化，我们计算了面积范围和百分比覆盖。对于面积范围，我们计算了北半球、南半球和整个全球的每日面积。我们还创建了每月和每年的面积范围，以量化基于每日面积范围数据集的冰冻圈面积范围变化。所有面积范围计算均基于等面积投影。百分比覆盖的计算是根据每个网格在定义时间尺度内包含冰冻圈覆盖的天数比例，例如每月或每年。为了表征冰冻圈覆盖的时间和持续时间，我们识别了冰冻圈覆盖的首日（FD）、末日（LD）、持续时间（DR）和天数（ND）。我们调查了相对于1981-2000年长期平均值的每月和每年变量的异常。趋势使用异常值的线性回归进行计算。趋势的统计显著性使用双尾t检验在95%置信水平下确定。时间序列使用小波分析进行平滑。趋势的不确定性也使用95%置信水平进行确定。每日冰冻圈范围使用GSOD产品进行验证。为了验证我们重建的每日冰冻圈范围数据集，使用了14,310个站点进行验证。每个站点的观察每日冰冻圈状态是基于上述方法，使用观察到的每日最低气温和雪深确定的。接下来，提取每个站点位置的重建每日冰冻圈范围值。观察到的（GSOD）冰冻圈状态随后用于验证我们重建的每日冰冻圈范围。
datasetCn: 本研究使用的数据集包括海冰、雪盖和近地表冻土。格林兰和南极冰盖的面积范围包含在雪盖或近地表冻土产品中。我们基本上综合了三个主要数据产品：近地表冻土数据、雪盖范围数据和海冰面积范围。为了分析冰冻圈范围与气候变化的关系，我们使用了气温数据。我们还使用现场观测数据来验证我们的全球冰冻圈面积范围。海冰是北极和南极海洋的主要冰冻圈组成部分。在这里，我们使用了1978年至2016年的每日海冰范围数据集，空间分辨率为25 × 25公里，数据来源于国家雪冰数据中心（NSIDC）。对于全球雪盖范围，我们使用了来自欧洲中期天气预报中心的临时再分析（ERA-Interim）数据，时间范围为1979年至2016年，空间分辨率为0.25° × 0.25°。每日地面冻结/解冻状态数据从1979年至2016年，空间分辨率为25 × 25公里，数据来源于NSIDC。全球月平均气温数据自1979年起由东英吉利大学气候研究单位的气候研究单位时间序列版本4.04获得。本站数据用于验证我们的每日冰冻圈范围数据集。全球日总结（GSOD）产品由国家环境信息中心生产，输入来自综合地面数据。GSOD数据集由来自1929年至今的超过28,000个站点组成，包括最低、最高和平均气温、雪深、气压、露点温度、风速和降水变量。
findingsCn: 在1979年至2016年期间，全球冰冻圈面积每年大约减少87 ± 11 × 10^3 km²，北半球减少了102 ± 9.7 × 10^3 km²/年，而南半球则增加了14.6 ± 4.4 × 10^3 km²/年。冰冻圈覆盖的第一天推迟了3.6天，速度为每十年0.95天，最后一天提前了5.7天，速度为每十年1.5天。冰冻圈覆盖的持续时间和天数在研究期间分别减少了8.7天和7.6天。这些全球冰冻圈面积的变化与气温上升相关。

Verification.QuestionCn: 冰冻圈范围数据集是否使用现场观测站的数据进行了验证？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the synthesis of cryospheric data products more dependent on reanalysis data sources such as ERA-Interim or on direct observational data from satellite missions like those from NSIDC?

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to integrate various cryospheric components into a global dataset?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于将各种冰冻圈组件整合到全球数据集中？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method involves gridding all products, such as sea ice, snow cover, and ground surface freeze/thaw status, into a uniform 0.25° × 0.25° spatial resolution using nearest neighbor interpolation at the daily time scale.
Example.AnswerCn: 一种数据收集方法涉及将所有产品（如海冰、雪盖和地面冻结/融化状态）以统一的0.25° × 0.25°空间分辨率进行网格化，采用最近邻插值法，时间尺度为每日。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset used to validate the accuracy of the cryospheric extent data?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于验证冰冻圈范围数据准确性的示例数据集？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset used for validation is the Global Summary of the Day (GSOD) product, which includes observations from over 28,000 stations worldwide, providing daily cryospheric status based on minimum air temperature and snow depth.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个用于验证的数据集示例是全球日总结（GSOD）产品，该产品包含来自全球超过28,000个站点的观测数据，提供基于最低气温和雪深的每日冰冻圈状态。

Feature Specification.AnswerEn: sea ice, snow cover, frozen ground extents, uniform spatial resolution 0.25° × 0.25°, temporal resolutions daily, monthly, annual, area extent, percent cover, first date, last date, duration, number of cryospheric cover days

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'cryospheric extent data set' mean in the context of climate change studies?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在气候变化研究的背景下，“冰冻圈范围数据集”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of climate change studies, a 'cryospheric extent data set' refers to a comprehensive collection of data that quantifies the spatial extent of the cryosphere, including components such as sea ice, snow cover, and frozen ground. This dataset integrates these elements to provide a holistic view of the cryosphere's coverage on a global scale, helping to analyze changes and their implications for climate systems.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在气候变化研究的背景下，“冰冻圈范围数据集”指的是一个全面的数据集合，量化冰冻圈的空间范围，包括海冰、雪盖和冻土等组成部分。该数据集整合了这些元素，以提供全球范围内冰冻圈覆盖的整体视图，帮助分析变化及其对气候系统的影响。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'percent cover' represent in the analysis of cryospheric data?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在冰冻圈数据分析中，“百分比覆盖”代表什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: 'Percent cover' in the analysis of cryospheric data represents the proportion of time a grid cell is covered by cryospheric elements (such as snow, ice, or frozen ground) over a specified time period, like a month or year. It provides an understanding of the temporal dynamics of the cryosphere by indicating how frequently a region is covered by these elements within the given timeframe.
Definition.AnswerCn: “百分比覆盖”在冰冻圈数据分析中表示在特定时间段内（如一个月或一年），一个网格单元被冰冻圈元素（如雪、冰或冻土）覆盖的时间比例。它通过指示在给定时间内一个区域被这些元素覆盖的频率，提供了对冰冻圈时间动态的理解。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the trends in global cryospheric area extent differ between the Northern Hemisphere and Southern Hemisphere, and how might data collection methods contribute to these differences?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 全球冰冻圈面积范围的趋势在北半球和南半球之间有哪些不同之处？数据收集方法如何可能导致这些差异？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The trends in global cryospheric area extent show a decrease of 102 ± 9.7 × 10^3 km2/yr in the Northern Hemisphere, whereas the Southern Hemisphere exhibits an increase of 14.6 ± 4.4 × 10^3 km2/yr. These differences might be attributed to variations in data collection methods such as the types of cryospheric components measured (e.g., sea ice versus frozen ground) and regional climate variations that influence the observations captured by satellite and reanalysis data.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 全球冰冻圈面积的趋势显示，北半球的面积每年减少102 ± 9.7 × 10^3 km2，而南半球则每年增加14.6 ± 4.4 × 10^3 km2。这些差异可能归因于数据收集方法的变化，例如测量的冰冻圈组成部分（如海冰与冻土）类型，以及影响卫星和再分析数据所捕获观测结果的区域气候变化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the integration of multiple cryospheric components into a single dataset improve the understanding of global cryospheric changes?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 将多个冰冻圈组件整合到一个数据集中如何改善对全球冰冻圈变化的理解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Integrating multiple cryospheric components such as sea ice, snow cover, and frozen ground extents into a single dataset allows for a holistic estimate of the cryosphere's response to climate change. This approach provides a comprehensive view of the overall changes and highlights the importance of assessing the cryosphere as a whole. By synthesizing these components, researchers can quantify changes to the hemispheric and global cryosphere, offering insights into its relationship with climate trends.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 将多个冰冻圈组件，如海冰、雪盖和冻土范围整合成一个数据集，可以全面估计冰冻圈对气候变化的响应。这种方法提供了整体变化的全面视角，并强调了将冰冻圈作为一个整体进行评估的重要性。通过综合这些组件，研究人员可以量化半球和全球冰冻圈的变化，提供对其与气候趋势关系的深入见解。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do the observed changes in the timing and duration of cryospheric cover correlate with rising air temperatures, and what does this imply about future cryospheric trends?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 观察到的冰冻圈覆盖的时间和持续时间变化与气温上升之间的关系如何，这对未来冰冻圈趋势意味着什么？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The observed changes, such as the delay in the first day and advancement of the last day of cryospheric cover, correlate with rising air temperatures. This correlation suggests a reduction in the duration and number of cryospheric cover days over time. These trends imply that future cryospheric trends will likely continue to show a decrease in cryospheric area extent and duration, driven by ongoing global temperature increases, impacting water resources, ecological systems, and energy exchanges within the earth's climate system.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 观察到的变化，如冰冻覆盖的第一天延迟和最后一天提前，与气温上升相关。这种相关性表明，冰冻覆盖天数的持续时间和数量随着时间的推移而减少。这些趋势暗示，未来的冰冻趋势可能会继续显示冰冻面积的范围和持续时间的减少，这一变化受到全球气温持续上升的驱动，影响水资源、生态系统以及地球气候系统内的能量交换。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the integration of satellite remote sensing data, reanalysis data, and observational data when constructing a global-scale cryospheric extent dataset?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在构建全球尺度的冰冻圈范围数据集时，哪些因素促成了卫星遥感数据、再分析数据和观测数据的整合？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The integration of satellite remote sensing data, reanalysis data, and observational data is crucial for capturing the various elements of the cryosphere, such as sea ice, snow cover, and frozen ground extents, to create a comprehensive global-scale cryospheric extent dataset. Each type of data provides unique insights that, when combined, allow for a holistic assessment of the cryosphere in response to climate change.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 卫星遥感数据、再分析数据和观测数据的整合对于捕捉冰冻圈的各个元素（如海冰、雪盖和冻土范围）至关重要，以创建一个全面的全球冰冻圈范围数据集。每种数据类型提供独特的见解，当它们结合在一起时，可以对冰冻圈在气候变化响应中的整体评估提供全面的支持。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the reasons for validating global cryospheric extent datasets with in-situ station observations?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么要用现场观测站的数据验证全球冰冻圈范围数据集？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Validating global cryospheric extent datasets with in-situ station observations is essential to ensure accuracy and reliability. Station data provide ground-truth validation, verifying the reconstructed daily cryospheric extent by comparing it against observed cryospheric status, which helps in identifying any discrepancies and improving dataset robustness.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 验证全球冰冻圈范围数据集与现场观测站数据的准确性和可靠性至关重要。站点数据提供了地面真实验证，通过将重建的每日冰冻圈范围与观察到的冰冻圈状态进行比较，帮助识别任何差异并提高数据集的稳健性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the likely consequences on data accuracy and spatial resolution when interpolating sea ice extent data to daily resolution using nearest neighbor interpolation?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在使用最近邻插值法将海冰范围数据插值到日分辨率时，数据准确性和空间分辨率可能会产生哪些后果？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Interpolating sea ice extent data to daily resolution using nearest neighbor interpolation can impact data accuracy and spatial resolution by potentially introducing errors or artifacts, especially during periods with sparse data. This method of interpolation might not capture finer spatial details, leading to less precise representation of sea ice extent changes over time.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用最近邻插值法将海冰范围数据插值到日分辨率可能会影响数据的准确性和空间分辨率，尤其是在数据稀疏的时期，这种插值方法可能会引入错误或伪影。该方法可能无法捕捉到更细的空间细节，从而导致对海冰范围变化的表示不够精确。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What effects might arise from combining different cryospheric components such as frozen ground, snow cover, and sea ice into one comprehensive dataset on research findings?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将不同的冰冻圈组成部分，如冻土、雪盖和海冰，结合成一个综合数据集可能会产生哪些影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Combining different cryospheric components into one comprehensive dataset can provide a holistic view of the cryosphere's overall response to climate change. However, it may also lead to challenges in maintaining the integrity of individual component data, potentially affecting precision in analyzing specific cryospheric processes.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将不同的冰冻圈组件合并成一个综合数据集可以提供冰冻圈对气候变化整体响应的全面视角。然而，这也可能导致在维护各个组件数据完整性方面的挑战，从而可能影响对特定冰冻圈过程分析的精确性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the purpose of integrating various cryospheric elements such as sea ice, snow cover, and frozen ground into a unified global dataset?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 将各种冰冻圈元素（如海冰、积雪和冻土）整合到统一的全球数据集中的目的是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal of integrating these cryospheric elements is to create a holistic estimate that quantifies changes to the hemispheric and global cryosphere due to climate change. This integration highlights the importance of assessing the cryosphere as a whole, providing a comprehensive way to estimate its overall changes and supporting further research on the cryosphere's response to climate change.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 整合这些冰冻圈元素的目标是创建一个整体估计，量化由于气候变化导致的半球和全球冰冻圈的变化。这种整合突显了将冰冻圈作为一个整体进行评估的重要性，提供了一种全面的方式来估计其整体变化，并支持进一步研究冰冻圈对气候变化的响应。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the intended outcomes of analyzing the long-term spatiotemporal variability of cryospheric components in relation to climate change?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 分析冰冻圈组成部分的长期时空变化与气候变化的关系的预期结果是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intended outcomes include understanding the cryosphere's area extent and percent cover changes over time, identifying trends and anomalies, and correlating these changes with rising air temperatures. This analysis is crucial for assessing the cryosphere's response to climate change and providing foundational support for studies on ecosystems and carbon cycles.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 预期的结果包括了解冰冻圈的面积范围和覆盖百分比随时间的变化，识别趋势和异常，并将这些变化与气温上升进行关联。这一分析对于评估冰冻圈对气候变化的响应至关重要，并为生态系统和碳循环的研究提供基础支持。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are used to integrate satellite remote sensing data, reanalysis data, and observational data into a comprehensive cryospheric dataset?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 用于将卫星遥感数据、再分析数据和观测数据整合成综合冰冻圈数据集的程序有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To integrate these data sources into a comprehensive cryospheric dataset, the process involves synthesizing sea ice, snow cover, and frozen ground extents into one global cryospheric extent data set. This is achieved by gridding all products into a uniform 0.25° × 0.25° spatial resolution using nearest neighbor interpolation at the daily time scale. For the ground surface freeze/thaw status, twice daily (AM and PM) values are averaged into daily resolution, while snow cover and sea ice extents are adjusted to daily scales as well.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了将这些数据源整合成一个综合的冰冻圈数据集，过程涉及将海冰、雪盖和冻土范围合成一个全球冰冻圈范围数据集。这是通过将所有产品以统一的0.25° × 0.25°空间分辨率进行网格化，采用最近邻插值法在日尺度上实现的。对于地表冻结/融化状态，上午和下午的两次值被平均为日分辨率，而雪盖和海冰范围也被调整为日尺度。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can the long-term spatiotemporal variability of the cryosphere be assessed using the available data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何利用现有数据评估冰冻圈的长期时空变异性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The long-term spatiotemporal variability of the cryosphere can be assessed by calculating both the area extent and the percent cover. Daily areas for the Northern Hemisphere, Southern Hemisphere, and the whole globe are computed, with monthly and annual area extents derived to quantify changes. The percent cover is determined as the ratio of days each grid contains cryospheric cover during a defined time scale, such as per month or year. Anomalies of monthly and annual variables are investigated with respect to the 1981–2000 long-term average, and trends are calculated using linear regression of the anomalies.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 冰冻圈的长期时空变异性可以通过计算面积范围和覆盖百分比来评估。计算北半球、南半球和全球的每日面积，并推导出每月和每年的面积范围以量化变化。覆盖百分比是通过在定义的时间尺度内（如每月或每年）计算每个网格包含冰冻圈覆盖的天数的比例来确定的。月度和年度变量的异常值相对于1981-2000年的长期平均值进行研究，并通过对异常值进行线性回归来计算趋势。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What validation methods are employed to ensure the accuracy of a reconstructed global cryospheric extent dataset?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为了确保重建的全球冰冻圈范围数据集的准确性，采用了哪些验证方法？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Validation of a reconstructed global cryospheric extent dataset involves using in-situ station observations. For example, the daily cryospheric status at each station is determined using observed daily minimum air temperature and snow depth. This observed status is then compared with the reconstructed daily cryospheric extent value at each station location. For verification, the GSOD product, with inputs from over 28,000 stations, is used to ensure the accuracy of the cryospheric extent data set.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 重建的全球冰冻圈范围数据集的验证涉及使用现场观测站的观测数据。例如，利用观测到的每日最低气温和雪深来确定每个站点的每日冰冻圈状态。然后将该观测状态与每个站点位置的重建每日冰冻圈范围值进行比较。为了验证，使用GSOD产品，该产品来自超过28,000个站点的输入，以确保冰冻圈范围数据集的准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods and technologies are used to integrate different cryospheric components into a unified global extent data set?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 用于将不同冰冻圈组件整合成统一全球范围数据集的方法和技术有哪些？
Enablement.AnswerEn: To integrate different cryospheric components into a unified data set, major cryospheric components such as sea ice, snow cover, and frozen ground extents are synthesized into a global data set. Products are gridded into a uniform 0.25° × 0.25° spatial resolution using nearest neighbor interpolation at the daily time scale. Snow cover is identified using ERA-Interim snow depths, and sea ice extent data is interpolated to daily resolution. The unified data set is created by classifying each grid cell as part of the cryosphere if it contains any frozen surface types.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 为了将不同的冰冻圈组件整合成一个统一的数据集，主要的冰冻圈组件如海冰、雪盖和冻土范围被合成到一个全球数据集中。产品以统一的0.25° × 0.25°空间分辨率进行网格化，使用最近邻插值法在日尺度上进行处理。雪盖是通过ERA-Interim雪深来识别的，海冰范围数据则被插值到日分辨率。统一的数据集通过将每个网格单元分类为冰冻圈的一部分（如果它包含任何冰冻表面类型）来创建。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do the specific conditions of high-latitude and high-altitude regions enable more rapid warming and subsequent cryospheric reduction?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 高纬度和高海拔地区的特定条件如何促使更快速的变暖和随之而来的冰冻圈减少？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The near-surface atmosphere in high-latitude and high-altitude regions has warmed faster than elsewhere, which contributes to more rapid cryospheric reduction. This warming has resulted in increased ice loss, ice sheet mass loss, and decreases in sea ice cover and thickness as well as terrestrial snow cover extent.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 高纬度和高海拔地区的近地表大气温度升高速度快于其他地区，这导致了更快速的冰冻圈减少。这种变暖导致了冰的损失、冰盖质量损失，以及海冰覆盖和厚度的减少，以及陆地雪覆盖范围的减少。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What data validation methods are utilized to ensure the accuracy of reconstructed daily cryospheric extent in global datasets?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了确保全球数据集中重建的每日冰冻圈范围的准确性，采用了哪些数据验证方法？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Data validation is performed using the GSOD product, which involves 14,310 stations for validation. The observed daily cryospheric status at each station is determined using observed daily minimum air temperature and snow depth. The reconstructed daily cryospheric extent value at each station location is extracted and compared against the observed cryospheric status.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据验证是通过GSOD产品进行的，涉及14,310个站点进行验证。每个站点的每日冰冻状态是通过观察到的每日最低气温和雪深来确定的。提取每个站点位置的重建每日冰冻范围值，并与观察到的冰冻状态进行比较。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using satellite remote sensing data, reanalysis data, and observational data in constructing a global cryospheric dataset?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用卫星遥感数据、再分析数据和观测数据构建全球冰冻圈数据集的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of satellite remote sensing data, reanalysis data, and observational data is highly effective in constructing a global cryospheric dataset, as it allows for comprehensive integration of various cryospheric components such as sea ice, snow cover, and frozen ground. This approach provides a holistic view and enables the analysis of long-term trends and variability, which is crucial for understanding the cryosphere's response to climate change.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用卫星遥感数据、再分析数据和观测数据在构建全球冰冻圈数据集方面非常有效，因为它允许对海冰、雪盖和冻土等各种冰冻圈组成部分进行全面整合。这种方法提供了一个整体视角，并使得分析长期趋势和变异成为可能，这对于理解冰冻圈对气候变化的响应至关重要。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your opinion, how can integrating in-situ station observations enhance the validation process of global cryospheric datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，整合现场观测站观测数据如何增强全球冰冻圈数据集的验证过程？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating in-situ station observations can significantly enhance the validation process of global cryospheric datasets by providing ground-truth data that helps verify the accuracy of satellite-derived or reanalysis products. It strengthens the dataset's reliability by offering localized observations, which can help identify discrepancies and improve the overall model calibration, thus contributing to a more robust understanding of cryospheric dynamics.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在位站观测的整合可以显著增强全球冰冻圈数据集的验证过程，通过提供地面真实数据来帮助验证卫星衍生或再分析产品的准确性。它通过提供局部观测来增强数据集的可靠性，这有助于识别差异并改善整体模型校准，从而有助于更全面地理解冰冻圈动态。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't figure out how near-surface frozen soils are integrated into a comprehensive cryospheric extent dataset.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法弄清楚近地表冻土是如何融入综合冰冻圈范围数据集中的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Near-surface frozen soils are synthesized into the global cryospheric extent dataset along with snow cover and sea ice by using data products that include both near-surface frozen soil data and snow cover extent. The spatial resolution is unified to 0.25° × 0.25° using nearest neighbor interpolation.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 近地表冻土与雪盖和海冰一起合成到全球冰冻圈范围数据集中，使用的数据产品包括近地表冻土数据和雪盖范围。空间分辨率统一为0.25° × 0.25°，采用最近邻插值法。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about how the timing and duration of cryospheric cover are determined in this kind of research.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定在这类研究中，冰冻圈覆盖的时间和持续时间是如何确定的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The timing and duration of cryospheric cover are characterized by identifying the first date (FD), last date (LD), duration (DR), and number of days (ND) of cryospheric cover. The data is analyzed for anomalies against a long-term average (1981-2000) and trends are calculated using linear regression.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 冰冻圈覆盖的时机和持续时间通过识别首次日期（FD）、最后日期（LD）、持续时间（DR）和冰冻圈覆盖天数（ND）来表征。数据与长期平均值（1981-2000）进行异常分析，并使用线性回归计算趋势。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how datasets are verified for accuracy when compiling a global cryospheric extent dataset.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白在编制全球冰冻圈范围数据集时，数据集是如何验证准确性的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The accuracy of the global cryospheric extent dataset is verified using observational data from station observations, such as the Global Summary of the Day (GSOD) product. Observed daily cryospheric status based on minimum air temperature and snow depth is compared with the reconstructed daily cryospheric extent for validation.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 全球冰冻圈范围数据集的准确性通过使用站点观测的观测数据进行验证，例如全球日总结（GSOD）产品。基于最低气温和雪深的观测每日冰冻圈状态与重建的每日冰冻圈范围进行比较以进行验证。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please analyze the methods used to integrate satellite remote sensing data, reanalysis data, and observational data for constructing a comprehensive cryosphere dataset.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请分析用于整合卫星遥感数据、再分析数据和观测数据的方法，以构建综合的冰冻圈数据集。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The methods involve gridding all cryospheric components into a uniform 0.25° × 0.25° spatial resolution using nearest neighbor interpolation at the daily time scale. For the ground surface freeze/thaw status, twice daily values are averaged into daily resolution. For snow cover, ERA-Interim snow depths greater than 1 cm are used, and sea ice extent is interpolated to daily resolution when necessary. All components are then combined into a single dataset by classifying each grid cell as cryosphere if it contains any frozen surface types.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 这些方法涉及将所有冰冻圈组件以统一的0.25° × 0.25°空间分辨率进行网格化，采用最近邻插值法在日尺度上进行处理。对于地面冻结/融化状态，采用每日两次的值进行平均以得到日分辨率。对于雪盖，使用ERA-Interim雪深大于1厘米的数据，而海冰范围在必要时插值到日分辨率。所有组件随后被组合成一个单一的数据集，通过将每个网格单元分类为冰冻圈，如果它包含任何冻结表面类型。
